statement.statement: Having reviewed the proposal we would like to raise strong objections based on the scale of the proposed buildings so close to a residential area. <mark>Residents have not been consulted</mark> on this and our views of the greenbelt adjacent to the estate will be ruined if this goes ahead. David Newton at number 6 The Grove also agrees.

David Newton at number 6 The Grove also agrees.
